titles.title: Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2019
Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2019

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority for financial assistance for supportive services for very low-income veteran families in permanent housing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2019
The bill extends through FY2021 the authorization for funding financial assistance for supportive services for very low-income veteran families in permanent housing.
